title: How to stop masturbating as a teenager - Quora

response.answer_text: You only need to stop if it’s negatively affecting you, your life, or other people. For instance, if it’s taking up the time you’re supposed to do homework, chores, or socialize, it’s mentally unhealthy, you need to be doing a variety of things, and making sure you’re doing stuff that helps your future. If you’re simply masturbating once or twice a day, that’s normal, to be honest. 20 times a day at 15 minutes a time? That’s taking up time you could be doing productive things. To be honest, though, it’s mentally and physically unhealthy to stop masturbating, because it fulfills a natural mental and physical desire that is unhealthy to suppress. If you think it’s sinful, think of this for a second: is it harming anybody? Jesus, for instance, had nothing to say about masturbation. The Old Testament may have, but many of those rules are impractical, unnecessary, and unhealthy, especially mentally, to follow. Enjoy the masturbation, sex and sexual pleasure are a beautiful part of life.
